column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Shots were fired on August 7
column4: 2019 on Stung Meanchey flyover at 3:30 am.------According to witnesses at the scene
column6: a white RX300 without a license plate was traveling along Route 271 in a south-to-north direction and onto the Steung Meanchey flyover. Arriving at the scene of the shooting
column7: three or four shots were fired into the sky from the car
column8: causing panic.------Local authorities arrived at the scene and recovered one of the empty casings for further investigation. ------Post News
